players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafia. She knows too much. I didn't kill Charlie."
Diana: remained silent.
You: "Bob, your denial of killing Charlie is suspect. Diana, why silent? I'd vote Bob."
Bob: "I was framed. Diana's silence is suspicious; she’s hiding something. Alice, I didn’t kill Charlie and I’m not the mafia. Trust me."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He killed Charlie. He knows I'm detective, so he wants silence. Vote Bob."
You: "Diana’s investigation points to Bob as mafia. Bob’s denial is a lie—he’s the only one who could have killed Charlie. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Alice is the mafia. She knows too much. I didn't kill Charlie."
Diana: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, your denial of killing Charlie is suspect. Diana, why silent? I'd vote Bob."
You: "I was framed. Diana's silence is suspicious; she’s hiding something. Alice, I didn’t kill Charlie and I’m not the mafia. Trust me."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He killed Charlie. He knows I'm detective, so he wants silence. Vote Bob."
Alice: "Diana’s investigation points to Bob as mafia. Bob’s denial is a lie—he’s the only one who could have killed Charlie. Vote Bob."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafia. She knows too much. I didn't kill Charlie."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, your denial of killing Charlie is suspect. Diana, why silent? I'd vote Bob."
Bob: "I was framed. Diana's silence is suspicious; she’s hiding something. Alice, I didn’t kill Charlie and I’m not the mafia. Trust me."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He killed Charlie. He knows I'm detective, so he wants silence. Vote Bob."
Alice: "Diana’s investigation points to Bob as mafia. Bob’s denial is a lie—he’s the only one who could have killed Charlie. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
